about_the_game:
The Steam page will be updated over time


In Between them you are an agent who gets different missions.
You yourself have the decision how to complete the mission and therefore you have several options to choose from.

The missions take place in different locations.

Stage of development:

Since the game is still in the beginning phase and is currently still a one-man project, the publication may take a while.

The pictures are from the first mission.
2 more missions are already planned.
But of course there will be more missions.

The texture in the game is changing and is currently being used for the functional test.

Charly:
„Since I'm not that good at drawing, I chose the pixelart for this game and put more focus on a realistic environment but also a realistic AI of all NPCs in the game.“

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500MB
